text: Newlyweds Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are looking north for their honeymoon. The newly anointed Duke and Duchess of Sussex are planning to spend their honeymoon at the Fairmont Jasper Park Lodge in Alberta, Canada, TMZ reported Monday. According to the celebrity gossip website, the former “ Suits ” actress, 36, and her hubby, 33, will stay at the mountain resort ’ s 6, 000 - square - foot Outlook Cabin – aka “ The Royal Retreat. ” The luxurious six - bedroom cabin previously welcomed King George VI and Queen Elizabeth in 1939 as well as Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip in 2005. “ Supreme comfort is present in every detail of the sumptuously comfortable bedrooms, enclosed verandas and majestic stone fireplace that warms both the dining room
